channel.title: [Outdated] Forum of Lies Hub
channel.description:
# Welcome to the wonderful wacky (And sometimes stressful) world of FoL! ----- # Useful Links
[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-clean-with-no-talking/1998]Class Cards Thread![/url] [url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1eAoQS7saD6SL-s9v0Z6A5Fthb_XrraZt_IvBuslsoBs/edit?usp=sharing]Spreadsheet of Complete, Ongoing and Planned FoL and SFoL games! Also includes information on how to sign up to host.[/url] [url=https://discord.gg/YU7aVWd]The Forum of Lies Discord Server![/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-getting-started/49368]A friendly "how to get started" guide by one of our own players! [/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-new-player-guide/71790] New player guide by our good boy[/url]
---------- # General Gameplay Infomation
## Rules 1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven't posted content in 36 hours, you'll be prodded for inactivity. If you don't respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not quote private host messages 5. Don't throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 6. Refrain from posting so many times in a row. 7. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host. 8. Please add links in the main post to every notable event (FoL Events) 9. You are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you a temporary blacklist meaning you can’t join a forum of lies for a while. Further leaving may net with a permanent blacklist 10. Lets all have fun and play together! 11. Do not edit or delete made posts. 12. Do not like posts in a thread if you are dead in that game.
## Gameplay * Days last 72 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 24 hours. * All actions must be sent to the mod. * Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server or forum message. * The priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server or forum message. * All classes will be used and will be used as they are found in the Class Cards Thread.
## Executions * To accuse someone say "/accuse [player]" or "/vote [player]" * Should the votes reach the majority, that player will be executed and the day will end.
## Picking a New King * If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. * When the king dies a 24 hour period starts. In this, players may vote in their class PM for who they want to become the next king and day abilities are disabled. * Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it.
## Action Results
[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-hosting-feedback-guide/75082]Feedback List[/url]
After being redirected/occupied/jailed 3 times, you are redirect/occupy immune.
After being jailed 3 times, you are jail immune.
## Journals
* PM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone. Journals are limited by 1000 characters. ----------
# Game Archive

item.title: [Outdated] Forum of Lies Hub
item.dc:creator: Queen_Alfa
item.description:
Welcome to the wonderful wacky (And sometimes stressful) world of FoL!

Useful Links

Class Cards Thread!
Spreadsheet of Complete, Ongoing and Planned FoL and SFoL games! Also includes information on how to sign up to host.
The Forum of Lies Discord Server!
A friendly “how to get started” guide by one of our own players!
New player guide by our good boy

General Gameplay Infomation

Rules

  1. Follow the Global Forum Rules
  2. If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced.
  3. No private messaging others in the game about the game.
  4. Do not quote private host messages
  5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose
  6. Refrain from posting so many times in a row.
  7. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host.
  8. Please add links in the main post to every notable event (FoL Events)
  9. You are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you a temporary blacklist meaning you can’t join a forum of lies for a while. Further leaving may net with a permanent blacklist
  10. Lets all have fun and play together!
  11. Do not edit or delete made posts.
  12. Do not like posts in a thread if you are dead in that game.

Gameplay

  • Days last 72 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 24 hours.
  • All actions must be sent to the mod.
  • Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server or forum message.
  • The priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server or forum message.
  • All classes will be used and will be used as they are found in the Class Cards Thread.

Executions

  • To accuse someone say “/accuse [player]” or “/vote [player]”
  • Should the votes reach the majority, that player will be executed and the day will end.

Picking a New King

  • If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected.
  • When the king dies a 24 hour period starts. In this, players may vote in their class PM for who they want to become the next king and day abilities are disabled.
  • Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it.

Action Results

Feedback List

After being redirected/occupied/jailed 3 times, you are redirect/occupy immune.

After being jailed 3 times, you are jail immune.

Journals

  • PM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone. Journals are limited by 1000 characters.

Game Archive

Classic Forum of Lies
